title: Hotel Guru Residency
address: shree guru residency, jhansi rani lakshmi bai road, cftri campus, kajjihundi, karnataka, india
details: A short walk from Mysore Junction (700 m), Guru Residency is suitable for budget travellers. Must-visit attractions like Mysore Palace (2.1 km) and St. Philomenas Church are about 3 km from the hotel.<br><br>In addition to a meeting room and multi-purpose hall, the hotel features kids play area. Other conveniences include Wi-Fi, guided tours, pick-up/drop facility, front desk, parking and housekeeping.<br>&nbsp;<br>The property features AC and non-AC rooms that are equipped with cable TV, telephone, chairs and tea/coffee maker. The 2 spacious Club Suites come with a separate living room.<br><br>You can enjoy a variety of Chinese and Indian dishes at Authana Deluxe, the hotels multi-cuisine vegetarian restaurant.<br><br><br>

title: Mysore Das Prakash Hotel
address: Gandhi Square, Opp Prabha Talkies, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: One of the cityÃ¢'s oldest landmarks, the Dasaprakash Hotel, known for its exhilarating dishes and ice creams, will cease to exist and give way to a residential complex.<br><br>The Madras High Court had awarded the sale of the prime property near the famous Egmore railway station for Rs. 165 crore to reality firm Prince Foundations based on an MoU between the promoters and the company.<br><br>Once a popular venue for weddings and a host for prime ministers and politicos, the hotel ran into financial difficulties, resulting in its closure.<br><br>Dasaprakash was started by the late K. Seetharama Rao in early 1930s as the first in a chain of hotels he set up in Chennai, Mysore, Udagamandalam and elsewhere in south India.<br><br>Many leaders such as Nehru, Kamaraj, Annadurai and former US Ambassador to India John Kenneth Galbraith have dined at the hotel and appreciated its quality.<br><br><br>

title: Barbeque Nation
address: Ground Floor, BM Habitat Mall,, Mangalore-Mysore Hwy, Jayalakshmipuram, Mysuru, Karnataka 570012
details: Barbeque Nation is an Indian restaurant chain owned by Indore-based Sayaji Hotels Limited. The first restaurant opened in Mumbai in January 2006. The restaurant chain also has private equity firm CX Partners as its investor.<br>

title: Olive Garden
address: Next to Jayachamaraja Golf Club  Maharanapratap Road, Nazarbad,  Chamundipuram, Mysore,  Karnataka
